name: ITLibDistinguishedPlaylistKind
desc: These constants specify the possible kinds of distinguished playlists.

items.name: case kindNone
items.desc: The playlist isn’t a distinguished playlist.

items.name: case kindMovies
items.desc: The playlist contains all the movies in the iTunes library.

items.name: case kindTVShows
items.desc: The playlist contains all the TV shows in the iTunes library.

items.name: case kindMusic
items.desc: The playlist contains all the music items in the iTunes library.

items.name: case kindAudiobooks
items.desc: The playlist contains all the audiobooks in the iTunes library.

items.name: static var kindBooks: ITLibDistinguishedPlaylistKind
items.desc: The playlist contains all the audiobooks in the iTunes library.

items.name: case kindRingtones
items.desc: The playlist contains all the iOS ringtones in the iTunes library.

items.name: case kindPodcasts
items.desc: The playlist contains all the podcasts in the iTunes library.

items.name: case kindVoiceMemos
items.desc: The playlist contains all the voice memos in the iTunes library.

items.name: case kindPurchases
items.desc: The playlist contains all the user’s purchases from the iTunes Store.

items.name: case kindiTunesU
items.desc: The playlist contains all the user’s iTunes U items.

items.name: case kind90sMusic
items.desc: The default Smart Playlist that iTunes creates of the user’s music from the 1990s.

items.name: case kindMyTopRated
items.desc: The default Smart Playlist that iTunes creates of the user’s top rated media items.

items.name: case kindTop25MostPlayed
items.desc: The default Smart Playlist that iTunes creates of the user’s 25 most played media items.

items.name: case kindRecentlyPlayed
items.desc: The default Smart Playlist that iTunes creates of the user’s most recently played media items.

items.name: case kindRecentlyAdded
items.desc: The default Smart Playlist that iTunes creates of the user’s most recently added media items.

items.name: case kindMusicVideos
items.desc: The default Smart Playlist that iTunes creates of the user’s music videos.

items.name: case kindClassicalMusic
items.desc: The default Smart Playlist that iTunes creates of the user’s classical music.

items.name: case kindLibraryMusicVideos
items.desc: The playlist contains all the music videos in the iTunes library.

items.name: case kindHomeVideos
items.desc: The playlist contains all the user’s home videos in the iTunes library.

items.name: case kindApplications
items.desc: The playlist contains all the user’s iOS apps in the iTunes library.

items.name: case kindLovedSongs
items.desc: The playlist contains all the user’s loved music.

items.name: case kindMusicShowsAndMovies
items.desc: The default Smart Playlist that iTunes creates of the user’s music shows and movies.
